Text: PLEASE continue to seed this after downloading.  Since it is a rarity, let's share the wealth ;)
I think this was never released and you have it?
I heard of the leaked version a few years ago and have been searching ever since.  I was literally handed to me just two weeks ago....but it was definitely worth all the waiting IMO.
Awesome...I loved Conquest Frontier Wars..Still have the original disc...thnx for sharing this
it works on Win7....awesome...thnx a lot

FYI - Apparently, there is a new movement attempting to resurrect The Vyrium Uprising.  I'm uncertain as to whether this is the base for that product or not.  If so, kudos to those at Kickstarter / Peezocker.
